page.title: 14CLUBS
page.content: The following is a list of all the active clubs and organisations in the village- Mens Institute Womens Institute Cub scouts Church choir Scouts Male voice choir Brownies Young farmers Guides Flower show Bell ringers Mothers Union Whist club Band of Hope Sewing circle Fellowship group Meals on wheels Pelynt Players Play school 2 Sunday schools Maypole committee Bingo Thursday club(Senior citizens) The Original Ten club(A social club) Yoga class Dancing class British Legion Evening Institute Many people in the village belong to other organisations elsewhere - e.g the Lions,Womens choir,Model making, political organisations etc.
